Hans

A Space-Western Cursive

Hans is an experiment from winter 2015 to design a modular-geometric cursive typeface. My interpretation was highly condensed, squarish, and monolinear. The typeface is still in the rough phase and is by no means complete. I plan to design an fully-fledged expansion, including a text version in 2017.
